project_info.title: Makarios: Your Keys to the Kingdom

outline.title: Makarios: Your Keys to the Kingdom
outline.summary: Title slide introducing the presentation as a founder's guide to understanding and launching the app.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/OR9m5p5sysw1.jpg - The title slide needs a compelling image related to Christian apps and faith growth. Image 1, showing a phone with a faith-related title, is the most suitable and general.

outline.title: What is Makarios?
outline.summary: Overview of the app's name origin, mission, target audience, and monetization model.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/JbUIhkZ5RLsr.jpg - This slide describes the app's mission and target audience. Image 2 shows a clean, modern app interface focused on spiritual growth, which aligns well with the content.

outline.title: The Car is Built: What's Complete
outline.summary: Summary of the 8 core features that are fully built and ready for users.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/bKNpPrYLMuWT.jpg - This slide lists the app's features. Image 7 shows multiple screens of a faith-based app, illustrating the concept of various features and content.

outline.title: The Design Philosophy
outline.summary: Explanation of the premium, dark, and elegant design choices.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/8qEbtROlW3Ca.webp; /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/pqwfFSkODGYX.jpg - This slide focuses on the dark, premium design philosophy. Images 4 and 6 both showcase dark-themed app designs, which visually reinforce the slide's key point.

outline.title: The Technology Stack
outline.summary: Overview of the modern technologies powering the app (React, TypeScript, Vite, etc.).

outline.title: The Architecture
outline.summary: Description of the component-based architecture and single-page application structure.

outline.title: User Flows
outline.summary: Explanation of the three main user flows: Guest, Registration, and Returning User.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/e5rgTg47hZfW.webp - This slide discusses user flows and navigation. Image 3 shows a simple, clean user interface with a focus on tracking and daily use, which relates to the user experience.

outline.title: What's Simulated: The Engine Needs Fuel
outline.summary: Breakdown of the simulated backend components that need to be built.

outline.title: The Roadmap: From Prototype to Production
outline.summary: A 10-week roadmap outlining the path to launch.

outline.title: Content Management
outline.summary: Instructions on how to manage content using the constants.ts file.

outline.title: App Store Preparation
outline.summary: Checklist of items needed for App Store submission.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/GsiRujtQJFns.png - This slide discusses App Store preparation and marketing assets. Image 8 shows various app screens, which are similar to the screenshots needed for an App Store listing.

outline.title: Next Steps: Your Action Items
outline.summary: Immediate action items for the founder to move the project forward.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/c5gw8enDchCO.jpg - This slide lists action items for the founder. Image 5 shows a dashboard with progress and statistics, which can metaphorically represent the tracking and action required for the next steps.

outline.title: Thank You
outline.summary: Closing slide emphasizing the readiness of the prototype and excitement for the future.
